Although  Mike Pence  was inspired by conservative talk-show host  Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his "no personal attacks""  pledge.  Conservative media, including  Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences,   Mike Pence  told The Indianapolis Star in 1995. When  David McIntosh , who succeeded  Phil Sharp , decided to run for governor in 2000,  Mike Pence  won a six-way primary for the GOP nomination in the east-central Indiana district.

Mike Pence  does, gets one called by the elites, at mildest, "an ideologue.""  Elitists may call reflecting the values of the people, or, as the Declaration of Independence phrased it,  the consent of the governed,  ideological. There is another, and better grounded, way to frame what is going on here:  Mike Pence  is a man of the people. That is, for him, a matter of principle.
